content.label: It is better a lot of dugón games I, have played

This is a puzzle game. It is OK in that regards, but it is definitely not an RPG. The encounters, items and progressions are spoon fed to you and you can only get to the next ones by solving the current puzzle. I wanted to play an RPG so I am disappointed with the game. I made it to level 4 and have now deleted the game. By level 4 the puzzles are not very interesting or unique. They make you go through the nearly infinite combinations of possibilities in order to solve the current puzzle. If you enjoy beating your head against your phone with no purpose or real progression of your characters, this game is for you!

I absolutely loved this game! It has a great mix of combat and puzzles, along with a boat load of secrets to discover! It’s definitely not the easiest game, so I would recommend casual players play on Easy, but even then, it’s a ton of fun! I would love to see the second game come to mobile at some point, because having played it, I can say it’s even better than the first!
Good overall,  glitchy on IOS. Playing on IPhone 8+, and Tomes found in game, do not have any effect on party members!

It’s an amazing game but the fact that you are so easily able to soft lock yourself in some of the puzzles which ends up making it so you no longer can progress in the game say if you DIDN'T HAVE AN ARROW FOR A PUZZLE AFTER PLAYING FOR 8 HOURS AND WERE LOCKED AWAY FROM SEARCHING PREVIOUS FLOORS...It’s just really silly 

UPDATE: IM JUST DUMB AND HAD AN ARROW HIDDEN AWAY IN A SMALL CREVICE I COULDN'T FIND, THIS GAME IS ACTUALLY REALLY GOOD
Absolutely a dream of a rpg dungeon crawler.

Well this is not a pay to win mindless mobile game.  This is a port of an insanely good pc dungeon crawler.  Graphics are rich, no lag, difficult and challenging. Not for the casual gamer, but a ton of fun.  Best dungeon crawler I could find.

I had originally owned this for PC, but after playing it on my IPhone/IPad the game was so much more enjoyable for me; this game is perfect with a touch screen. I hope they eventually port the sequel onto IOS or the Nintendo Switch.
This one is the one all others are compared to. I kid you not, play this for a while and you’ll want more. Still love this and play it years after release.
Play for 2h and I love it . I’m in lvl 2 (I spend a little time for my party creation )and so far it is worth it

This is by far the best dungeon crawler on the App Store. Some reviews say it’s too hard for casual players and I would say they are correct. But this is why it’s great. If you love old school grid-based dungeon crawling with modern graphics and puzzles look no further! Will you have to look up help for some puzzles or battles, probably, but why is that a bad thing? Newer dungeon crawlers hold your hand too much. Legend of Grimrock won’t. Bask in the challenge Grimrockers!

Challenging puzzles and battles.  All around awesomeness for any lover of RPGs.

Please make more...........
Great job! I’ve played LoG 1 & 2non Mac for a few years. Solid port to iOS. And yes, the game is challenging.
Outstanding game. Thank you for transcending the normal experience of iOS gaming. Please release LOG2!

If you’re used to playing games where being the right level means that you’ll win every battle, then this game is not for you. You can’t tap your way to victory, but if you are clever, you’ll be rewarded with an awesome game filled with challenges, and great puzzles. 

This is an exploration and strategy game where you have to earn every scrap of power you get. Every step is fraught with the possibility of danger, and you have to think long term as you spec your characters, because the wrong level of magic is useless most of the time. I really like the option to play as a bug too. Very fun and immersive.
Great game. ETA part 2 for iOS? Please? 😁
Love the game! I recommend to play it on the hard level of difficulty. Amazing puzzles, interesting fights.
True RPGs are incredibly rare on the App Store.  This is one of them.

This game is really intense. If you don't auto create your party you have to know what you are doing. 

Level 4 was already super hard even on easy mode. 

Level 1 is like elementary school 
Level 2 is like high school 
Level 3 is like community college 

I've played for 10 hours with a walk through and am only 1/3 the way through. 

The game is really complex. Need to feed your party. Party can only carry certain amount of weight. Party gets many different symptoms. 

Cool thing is that Dungeon walls change every few levels.

title.label: AmAxing olds hook rpg - not for snowflakes

content.label: Just read the top review that this game was too hard for casual gamers... this game is old school awesomeness and while I haven’t beaten it yet it’s freaking amazing. You have to use brains and tactics and not button mashing to win which I think younger gamers hate.

If you are into the kind of game where you’ll progress to level 5 only to run out of food and have to start over without any assurance that you’ll do any better next time because there is literally about 5% of the food you need available from the dungeon, then maybe this is for you. 

Otherwise it’s tedious and boring!
Good

First I thought i find the best game. I was wrong. Don’t waste your time. I played on easy and after the 3rd level it became very hard. I lost interest. Giant mushrooms, never wanna die, it takes long time to kill them and after a tons of soldiers and double arrow guys with poisoned arrows. Im not saying it’s impossible to make this level but no more adventure at this point only endless fights. I feel like its a waste of time. Other part of this level has a lot of slime. It took me half day to figure it out how to kill them. I just don’t care anymore.
My interest went from 100-0. Even its on easy setting its too hard. I started the whole thing over from the first level, because at first i feed them too much I was out of food so fast. I Feel like they created a great game but they don’t test it enough.  Next time. Not worth the money. Don’t believe for the 5 star reviews, probably they played the first level only. The first 3 levels are 5 star and then 0. So disappointed.

Played on normal because it said suitable for most players and I wanted some challenge.  By level two, the monsters were killing entire party with a couple hits.  It went from zero to ninety and I was still learning how to play!   Tutorial doesn’t really get in detail on spell casting with mages and there is who separate menu for selecting spells.  Also, really easy to pull up character menu in middle of fight instead of selecting fight icon.  I looked up tips and everyone said you had to side fight monsters in open spaces.  Not easy to do on iPhone with buttons that pull up player detail screens in middle of fight.  I am not a hard core gamer but thought an RGP game could be fun.  Characters are too weak to take on deadly monsters and if you don’t know how to run and fight on bad controls, you are done.  Do not buy this game unless you are experienced gamer really familiar with strategies required in maze fighting.  Shame, I did like first level, but after twenty plus tries, I give up.   Not something for a casual gamer just wanting to build characters to match level challenges.   I looked up other reviews and people were saying Easy level gets you a little more easier play but not for long and monsters will still be super hard on higher levels.  I won’t find out because I am taking it off my phone before I throw it against the wall.

title.label: Plays brilliantly on my iPad Pro

content.label: Finally got around to buying and playing thanks to my new tablet. Fabulous game. Looks awesome on the iPad.
In the original windows version you could hold on to the eye stones, but in the Mac version you can not take the eyes stones back to use them as you go forward.
Great game!!!
If you want a challenging RPG full of strategy, puzzles and fantastic graphics -- this is for you.
Great old school dungeon crawl. Could use better balance in character options, as there are some serious ways to screw up your character but generally super fun and engaging.
A great throwback to older games with a modern twist. Love the puzzles that are laced through the gameplay.

title.label: a lovely piece of gaming art

content.label: in a graph dungeon, guide 4 characters through dangerous encounters and puzzles. some of the ways out of levels (puzzles) require patience but they're not nonsense or trivial, especially if you decipher the clues carved into the rocky walls. characters are unique with stats skills & gear that change as you like just like pen-on-paper. if you're fed up with bad games and have ever liked anything about pnp roleplay &or dungeon crawling (even action rpg like diablo or torchlight 2) delete all the junk with IAP & no heart off your phone and play Legend of Grimrock! i couldn't recommend it more highly if you're someone looking for a fulfilling meaningful & challenging-but-never-stupidly-so mobile gaming experience.
Fun rpg
Loved it! It reminded me of an old Sega Genesis Dungeons & Dragons game I loved growing up.
Hard puzzles though. Doesn't ask for more money. Good!

The controls aren't like other games. It's a dungeon crawler and the map like a old table top D&D map, full of tiles. Basically you move 1 tile at a time so movement in the gam won't seem fluid like games your used to. Still that doesn't matter this game is amazing.
This game is ok until you realize your doing the exact same boring thing over and over. That and all 4 of your guys must be riding on each other's shoulders.

This game is fantastic and immersive, delivers great graphics and atmosphere. If you have ever played and liked math-paper-squared based RPGs such as Dungeon Master or the Ishar series, this game is for you.
Bring some time, as this is not a casual play though.
It has been a while since I had this much fun with a game and stayed up till the late hours...

Seems like it's a balanced dungeon crawler up until you hit the 5th level. Then the monsters become stupidly over powered leading to what is basically a cat and mouse style fight making having armor fairly useless since you can't take more than 3 hits before you're dead. Deleted and done.

title.label: First rate! Reminds me of Ultima Underworld

content.label: This reminds me of the old Ultimate Underworld and Eye of the Beholder games. I just loved those. I've been looking for a decent game to play on the iPad for a while. They're all repetitive and bore me to tears. This game is awesome, and reminds me of the hours and hours I used to spend in my old house when I was first married and we got our first computer. Love love love. The story is great, and the graphics are amazing! Have fun with this.
I like this game

Love this game great port. So there is a secret character in game who you unlock named toorum. But he functions differently from your usual party namely moves much faster and has access to using both hands in combat something unavailable in the normal party. Well I noticed the game just shuts off mid battle,(usually mid combat) idk if it's because of the increased move speed and hardware cant keep up or what great game definitely a recommended purchase main game apart from rare cases hasn't cashed on a iphone5
Wow, what an amazing game.  Brings back the old school challenge with beautiful and moody graphics.  Great job.  The best dungeon crawler by far on iOS.

This is such a fantastic dungeon crawler. It reminds me of many classics only better. I hope they port Legend of Grimrock 2, to iOS. Well done developers.  
  A couple of suggestions to the developers though. 
 🔘In game mini map. 
 🔘in game compass.

It was fun until I realized all the loot I was picking up was just bogging me down and would not help....and the fighting devolved into strafing and/or running away. Also looking at the same boring wall textures doesn't help. Not sure why this has such great reviews.

I scored this game as a low rating because  I can only be led to believe that people who love to solve a puzzle would be the only ones playing this game. LOGR has many many puzzles to challenge your wit! This is not the typical D and D I've played in the past. Perhaps I'm getting too old for many of these dungeon games, as this has certainly tried my patients. There is not much in the way of action and one can spend over 1/2 hour solving a puzzle for just one section of a dungeon. Some of the mysteries led me to look it up online and figure how one can one ever solve some of these ambiguous challenges? 
Just be weary about purchasing this game as it will have you scratching your head for many of these puzzles.
If you like old school style RPG's like Baldur's Gate, Icewind Dale, Avadon, Avernum, Ember and Dungeons of Chaos on iOS, then this game is for you.

Learn to save often while tackling this simple to learn tricky to play RPG. I wanted to play a game near Halloween, and this one may take until December to finish, but the challenge is worth it. Lots of walk-throughs available on internet when stuck, but I try to puzzle it out first. Use strategy with all the battles. Nice balance between battles & puzzles. Haunting storyline and great graphics.

Great game, love the difficulty it presents. Really makes me think, and the secrets are hidden well. My party has starved once and I've been taken out by higher level monsters, but it means you've gotta be quick to lead them around until you can kill them or heal. It's a great twist on turn based dungeon games.
Really fun simple concept but it becomes very challenging around lvl 5. Extremely enjoyable!

I am an old-school, first-generation dungeon crawler fan from back in the days of Wizardry (on the Apple IIe) and Bard's Tale.   This is an amazing tribute to the genre, and a terrific, challenging game for the iPad.  The puzzles are hard and the combat taxing.  Well done!
